Segment.name: ZA
Segment.comment: To provide activity details concerning product being reported

Field.name: ActivityCode
Field.comment: Code identifying activity details for the product being reported

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

SyntaxNote.name: P0203
SyntaxNote.comment: If either ZA02 or ZA03 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either ZA04 or ZA05 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P0607
SyntaxNote.comment: If either ZA06 or ZA07 is present, then the other is required.
